title: Heart of Oak
description: There's a large burl on the huge old oak at the heart of the forest that makes the tree appear to be pregnant. What will it give birth to?Kerica is born from the oak tree knowing nothing of the humans among whom she finds herself. The tree had a reason for making her, but Kerica has to figure out what it was before she can decide where she belongs.This is a 9500-word novelette.
author: Meredith Mansfield
